name: reliquefy
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to change or cause something to change back into a liquid form: We applied a steady heat to the frozen block until it reliquefied. She re-liquified the honey by warming the container in hot water. Related word
liquefy
More examplesFewer examplesThese machines can capture, store, and reliquefy helium on site.Use water to reliquefy the powder.The solid reliquifies when it is heated above 105 degrees Celsius.The system operates by reliquefying gas.
